feed.title: Combined summary - Handling alerts & communication on bitcoin.org

entry.title: Combined summary - Handling alerts & communication on bitcoin.org
entry.summary: Bitcoin.org has announced that it is addressing the issue of five alerts pages that lack visibility and are difficult to follow regarding past network events. To solve this problem, a setup has been created to help developers easily communicate about notable network events. The pull request for this setup includes code, screenshots, live demos, instructions, and details. This tool is designed specifically for developers, and all comments are welcome, as it is up to them to decide whether to merge it or suggest any modifications.
